abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by singer Nika Roza Danilova, who performs as Zola Jesus, at the Knitting Factory.
snippet: Nika Roza Danilova, who performs as Zola Jesus, showed a powerful voice that’s rare for pop at the Knitting Factory on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Nika Roza Danilova, who performs as Zola Jesus, showed a powerful voice that’s rare for pop at the Knitting Factory on Tuesday.

headline.main: Controlling Her Voice, and Her World
headline.print_headline: Controlling Her Voice, and Her World
headline.seo: Zola Jesus at the Knitting Factory — Review
